sub_title: Scientific Assessor Plant Protection Products Environmental Fate
summary: As a qualified microbiologist, I have over 14 years of working experience in the field of classical microbiology, microbial proteomics and molecular biology and over 3 years experience in plant protection product authorizations. I am a good communicator, strong in reviewing and data mining. I am punctual and I don't like to give up. Ambitious and perfect team player.

projects.title: Articles for School Children
projects.description: This project aims to provide quality reading material to school students in India. The students in good school in big cities like Pune, Mumbai, Bengalore are exposed to variety of good books, research institutes and modern education techniques. However, those in the distance rural regions lack such good education facilities. I along with some of my friends have written short articles in Marathi and English we distribute them to some such schools. Any sort of help from you is welcome!

● Project management and working with data
● Problem solving & strategic thinking
● Multitasking, planning
